ing: 1 pound pork roast, cut into 1 inch cubes
1/2 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
des: "This is a recipe that is similar to my Pennsylvania Dutch grandmother's but was  modified by me. She used a pressure cooker but I prefer the crock pot. I always serve this with a side of mashed potatoes and applesauce to accompany it."
ins:
Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker and stir well. Submerse the apple under the other ingredients.
Cook on High for one hour, reduce heat to Low and continue cooking for 5 hours or until pork is cooked through. Discard apple and serve.
